Install

list of tool

cat tools.list

    netcat
    ncat
    nmap
    wireshark
    tcpdump
    hashcat
    ffuf
    gobuster
    hydra
    zaproxy
    proxychains
    sqlmap

if we want to install all the tools of this list

sudo apt install $(cat tools.list | tr "\n" " ") -y
